1.title: Asteroid
1.plot: Malitas makes Supermagnet, with which he wants to draw to an asteroid the Earth so that it fell on the city and destroy it. The Defenders will learn about the villainous plans of Malitas and try to stop him.

2.title: Robot Bees
2.plot: Malitas invented the robotizer and with it transformed the ordinary bees into robots bees. A huge swarm of bees, obeying the orders of Malitas, attacks on Defenders. Kira, Alik and Bin make lavender gun and attacking robots bees.

3.title: Weeping Candy
3.plot: Kira and Alik develop a new tear gas grenade, using onion juice. Meanwhile, across the Galaxy, Malitas and his gang decide to drop an ink bomb on planet Earth, turning the blue planet black. Back at the team's home base in the garage, Bin locates the uninvited guests, and the Defenders hurry to intercept the pirates. They latch onto the pirate ship and foil Malitas' plan. At the crucial moment, Bin comes to the children's aid by hacking into the villains' onboard computer. Yet again, the attack turns into a complete fiasco for the villains.

4.title: Earthquake
4.plot: Jake tries out for the local junior soccer team, but fails yet again. Malitas sends Timor and Horror to Earth with his new invention, designed to trigger a powerful earthquake and destroy the planet that has offended Pirate Number One. The Defenders manage to avert the tragedy, once again the mysterious unknown heroes of their town.

5.title: Tim's Birthday
5.plot: To his horror, Max realizes that he has completely forgotten Shorty Tim's upcoming birthday. What's more, he can't even remember what his little brother wanted for a present. No matter how hard Max tries to remember what he promised to get his brother, he keeps drawing a blank. Meanwhile, back at the garage, the team is planning a birthday party for its youngest member. But Malitas spoils the surprise, arriving at the most inopportune moment, as he always does, with yet another "ingenious" invention in tow. This time, the villain has built a ball of lightning ...

6.title: A Lesson in Obedience
6.plot: Over the weekend, Max gets so carried away with a computer game starring his favorite hero that he forgets to clean his room and is grounded by his parents. Max has forgotten that the Defenders had made plans to test a new weapon: a soap cannon. His friends remind him of the scheduled test, but his Mom refuses to let him go out until he cleans his room. The team has to test the weapon without Max. In the absence of their leader, they end up fighting and get trapped inside soap bubbles, which cannot be destroyed from within. Meanwhile, Max has cleaned his room and ...

7.title: Clones and Anticlones
7.plot: The intergalactic pirates use deception to kidnap Kira and Alik. Using a new gadget invented by evil genius Malitas, they turn into clones of the children. Meanwhile, in the garage that serves as the Defenders' home base, Shorty is trying to avoid doing his homework. He nearly succeeds when the kids unmask the clone impostors and go on a mission to rescue Kira and Alik. The team leaves Shorty behind to guard the captured pirates, Horror and Timor, and to finish his math homework. The pirates promise to help Shorty. When he naively accepts their offer, they trick him ...

8.title: Sunstroke
8.plot: Villain Malitas produces super device - a solar inverter. This device takes the sun's energy and generate it into a deadly beam that can be used to destroy the city. Defenders come up with how to neutralize this device.

imdb.title: Zashchitniki
plot: A group of ordinary kids with extraordinary abilities have united to stop an alien invasion. They call themselves... THE DEFENDERS
